description: A heavy, normally tripod-mounted belt-fed grenade launcher used by the US Military since the start of the Cold War all the way to the Cataclysm, and if you can find some 40mm grenades, maybe even beyond.  This one has been modified to enable highly inaccurate hip-firing; it'd still require the shooter to have superhuman physical strength in order to be able to do so safely, however.
//: No rail and underbarrel slots until it is possible to prevent installing any sights other than laser sights on there.
